welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sao Lourenco da Serra
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sao Lourenco da Serra, where the vibrant culture and stunning landscapes will capture your heart. Known for its charming atmosphere and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Congonhas International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Congonhas International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Antônio Ribeiro Nogueira Jr. State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Antônio Ribeiro Nogueira Jr. State Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
